content: pattern chain 40 1 double_crochet chain 2 single_crochet in the 4th chain from hook *skip 2 2 double_crochet chain 2 single_crochet in the next chain * repeat across turn 2 chain 3 double_crochet chain 2 single_crochet in the first chain 2 space * 2 double_crochet chain 2 single_crochet in the next chain 2 space * repeat across turn repeat row 2 until the piece reaches the stated measurements or desired size finishing weave in your ends thread the needle with one yarn tail weave the needle back through several stitches about an inch turn and go back through beginning in the second stitch from needle repeat once more repeat with any other yarn tails snip the tails your notes © amber killian hooks yarn and cats 2021
